page.title: 09Population of Hannington
page.content: The Population is 280, contained in about 50 households. Of these approx- imately 20% are children of school age 33% are retired. All the people are white. These consist of local farm workers in tied cottages, a few indigenous people remain but mostly a migrant middle class, and small upper middle class,- comprising senior retired members of the Armed Forces, titled/decorated individuals and Landowners. The people are largely conservative in outlook. There has been an upsurge of interest in Local Government. A close knit community, albeit along class lines, who work together for the interest of the village.
